/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the red brick buildings that line the street. These buildings, with their traditional architecture, add a touch of history and culture to the modern cityscape. The street itself is filled with cars and buses, indicating a well-connected and active transportation system. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
